name: Operation Reincarnation
description:
Explore a procedurally generated dungeon, fight evil robots, collect batteries to power The Elevator and REINCARNATE!

Upon death, you reincarnate as a different character. Just go as far as you can(until you don't have enough batteries to power The Elevator)

IMPORTANT: If the game don't load try using a different browser. Some people have problems running it in Chrome

P.S.

Never make a game with procedurally generated levels for a 72 hour game jam. It takes longer than you can anticipate. That's why there are only two characters.
